Utterance: Hi! It’s so nice to see you again. How have things been since our last session?
Hey, Ellie! Things have been okay. I tried playing guitar every day like we talked about.
That’s fantastic! How did that go for you?
It was really nice. I felt more relaxed.
I’m glad to hear that! Did you notice any changes in your mood?
Yeah, I felt less stressed overall.
That’s great progress! How about the conversation with your girlfriend? Were you able to talk to her about how you felt?
I did! I brought it up during a calm moment.
That’s excellent! How did she respond?
She was surprised but listened. We ended up having a good talk.
That’s wonderful to hear! It sounds like you’re building better communication.
Yeah, I think so.
What did you learn from that conversation?
I learned that she didn’t realize she was interrupting me.
That’s insightful. It’s great that you both could discuss it openly. Do you feel more comfortable expressing your feelings now?
Definitely. I feel like I can talk to her more openly.
That’s a significant step! How does that impact your relationship?
It feels stronger. We’re more in sync now.
That’s so encouraging! Moving forward, what other areas would you like to focus on in our sessions?
I think I’d like to work on managing stress at work.
Absolutely! We can explore some techniques. Have you tried taking breaks as we discussed?
Yes, I took a break each day. It helped a lot.
Fantastic! What did you do during those breaks?
I went for short walks or just stepped away from my desk.
Those sound like great ways to recharge. How did you feel after taking those breaks?
More focused and less overwhelmed.
That’s great to hear! It seems like you’re discovering what works for you. Would you like to set a new goal around your work stress management?
Yes, I’d like to try some relaxation exercises.
Excellent choice! I can guide you through some techniques. How about we start with deep breathing exercises?
That sounds good.
Let’s practice a simple technique. Inhale deeply through your nose for a count of four, hold for four, and exhale through your mouth for a count of four. Ready?
Okay, let’s do it.
Inhale… hold… exhale. How does that feel?
It feels calming.
Wonderful! You can use this technique whenever you feel stressed. Would you like to practice this daily?
Yes, I can do that.
Fantastic! Let’s aim for a few minutes each day. Is there anything else you want to address today?
I think that’s it for now.
Alright! You’ve made great strides in our sessions. I’m really proud of you.
Thanks, Ellie! I appreciate it.
You’re welcome! I look forward to hearing about your progress next time.
Bye!
Bye!
